summary: Frontend testing completed for Happy Place Coffee targeted refinements: Menu side nav headers, Buy our Beans button, Bean detail page with grind selection, Blog Coffee 101 and Our Story tabs. All features working correctly.
test_credentials: None required - all data is MOCKED via /app/frontend/src/data/mock.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All targeted refinements tested and working. Key test results: 1) Drink Menu side nav shows 'Drink Menu' header WITHOUT coffee mug icon, 2) Breakfast Menu side nav shows 'Breakfast Menu' header, 3) Dinner Menu side nav shows 'Dinner Menu' header, 4) 'Buy our Beans' button visible in all three menu pages (Drink, Breakfast, Dinner), 5) 'Buy our Beans' navigates to /about#coffee-origins correctly, 6) About page 'Our Coffee Origins' section has id='coffee-origins' for anchor scrolling, 7) Clicking bean card navigates to /about/beans/:slug (tested colombia-supremo and ethiopia-yirgacheffe), 8) Bean detail page shows: image, name, notes, description, price ($23.95-$24.95), grind selector (Whole Beans/Ground), quantity selector (+/- buttons), Add to Cart button, 9) Adding bean to cart works - toast shows 'added to cart!', cart badge updates, 10) Bean grind selection persists in cart (shows 'Whole Beans' or 'Ground' as size), 11) Cart persists across page navigation, 12) Blog 'All' tab shows Coffee 101 article with correct Cold Brew image (not cropped), 13) Blog 'Coffee 101' tab shows interactive content with 7 expandable topic cards and search functionality, 14) Blog 'Our Story' tab shows repurposed content with hero image and 5 story sections with images, 15) Cart UI unchanged - existing cart behavior preserved with GlobalCart component
